Key Match Events: Andrew Benintendi's 10th-inning single helped the White Sox avoid a record-breaking 121st loss for the second straight game
Korey Lee gave the White Sox a 2-0 lead with a two-run homer in the second
Lenyn Sosa put Chicago back on top with a tiebreaking solo drive in the fourth
Miscellaneous Highlights: The White Sox are tied with the 1962 New York Mets for the modern major league record for losses in a season
The Angels matched a franchise record with their 95th loss
Others: The White Sox play Los Angeles again on Thursday before finishing their schedule with three games at Detroit
The Angels grounded into three double plays in the final four innings, including one with the bases loaded
